post.content:
Please review the key skills and description below. If you are qualified and interested, reply with a current resume (MS Word) ASAP.
Our client, a Canadian financial institution, requires 4 Java Developers AS SOON AS POSSIBLE, for their DOWNTOWN TORONTO office....
- 1 Senior (MAX 80K) - 1 Intermediate (MAX 70K) - 2 Junior (MAX 60K)
KEY SKILLS FOR ALL ROLES: JAVA, SQL, UNIX, Tibco, Calypso or other financial trading systems
PLEASE NOTE, that intermediate and senior level candidates who do NOT possess ALL OF THE ABOVE will NOT be considered.
These Java developers will contribute to the future enhancement, support and maintenance post-delivery of financial applications.
Responsibilities: - Gather detailed design specifications, create and review code and assess impact on other applications. - Work closely with other team members to ensure consistency in coding standards and approaches and to optimize
any synergy and re-use opportunities - Lead technical aspects of project from inception through to deployment (senior role) - Participate in analysis and system design specification sessions. - Produce documentation of design options and solutions according to System Development Life Cycle (SDLC) methodology. - Ensure that solutions adhere to development best practices and architectural principles. - Apply analytical skills to resolve problems and deliver viable solutions. - Provide detailed development estimates to Project Manager for development effort and weekly status reporting and budget forecasting (senior role) - Configuration management for the sub projects (senior role) - Responsible for coding, testing, packaging, deployment and support of builds as code is promoted from
development, system, acceptance and production environments. - Work closely with System Test Environment Management Team (STEMT) to ensure that environments are fully
functional and that builds are properly deployed. - Participate in development of test strategy, test plans, test cases and testing efforts (unit testing and integration testing of code). - Provide technical support to business and testing team during testing phases. Track defects, defect triage and resolution. - Data set up and environment shake down. - Coaching / mentoring of junior developers (intermediate and senior roles) - Integrate applications with Calypso financial trading system
Skills : - Develop detailed design specifications - Develop and support distributed and database driven applications in Java. - Apply analytical skills to resolve problems and deliver solutions. - Develop, implement and maintain solutions that maximize system availability. - Periodic scope assistance - Troubleshoot coding issues.
